import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-faculty-dashboard', templateUrl: './faculty-dashboard.component.html', styleUrls: ['./faculty-dashboard.component.css'] }) export class FacultyDashboardComponent { } Document

Welcome to Faculty Dashboard

Empower your teaching experience with our faculty dashboard. You can add, view, and edit students, take attendance, and monitor student records effortlessly. Manage everything with ease!
